title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Now let’s plot !  Look Freshwater Ecoregions South America!
code: library(feowR)  feow_sf <- read_feow() library(ggplot2)  ggplot(data = feow_sf)+   geom_sf() ggplot(data = feow_sf)+   geom_sf()+   coord_sf(xlim = c(-80, -35),            ylim = c(10,-55))

what:
Read FEOW HydroSheds data
This function downloads and reads the FEOW HydroSheds data from the
brunomioto/feowR repository. It returns a spatial data frame containing
the FEOW HydroSheds catchment polygons. — read_feow
